job.title: Data Scientist (Remote)
job.description: LAAgencia is a Recruitment Partner with a focus on Startup companies and SMB Were looking for a Data Analyst to join our clients team based in United States in a Remote job The Data Scientist is responsible for managing the master data set and developing respective reportsvisualizationsThe ideal person for this position has an exceptional eye for detail expertise as a data scientist and a solid understanding of popular data analysis tools Heshe will work closely with product owners across various lines of business to understand the objectives of the organization and prioritize any requirementsResponsibilities Use data to inform and influence the direction of team goals and inform business decisions 40  Take ownership of key components ensuring that they meet the needs of the business  Evangelizing evidencebased decision making by partnering with key decisionmakers and driving general accessibility of data and insights  Communicate results to senior management in verbal visual and written mediaDrive improvements in business outcomes by conduct hands on data mining and analysis to identify issues and improve operational processes 40  Work with internal stakeholders to ensure data integrity of daily reporting automation and customization  Manage pieces of operational data workflow and look to improve them by providing a scalable solutionContinually explore and iterate statistical models and features to advance our understanding of key underlying business drivers 20  Identify and drive improvements through standardization of process authoring new best practices and cultivation of new expertise  Understand how to break down complex problems into the key components where data science and machine learning can be used to improve existing solutionsRequirements Bachelors degree in Computer Science Mathematics Information Management or a related field4 years of experience as a data scientist or in a related fieldAbility to understand business needs and relay them into easy to understand nontechnical languageHighlevel written and verbal communication skills Desired skillsliExpertise in SQL and proven comfort and an intellectual curiosity for working with large sets of dataliFluency in Python Experience developing production software is a bonusliAbility to partner collaborate and communicate well with a diverse set of colleagues both technical and nontechnical at all levelsbrbrPowered by JazzHRlilili
